summary.overview: This batch job processes card cross-reference data by reading and validating relationships between card accounts and related entities. It generates business reports and analysis output for monitoring card system data integrity and cross-reference consistency.
business_functions: Read card cross-reference data from the card demo system
Process and validate cross-reference relationships between card accounts
Generate business reports and analysis output for system monitoring
Validate data integrity and consistency within card cross-reference structures

READXREF.jcl.program_overview: Processes card cross-reference data validation and reporting
